Type.Name: FieldAccessException
Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when there is an attempt to access a field outside the scope in which access is permitted.

para.block: This exception is typically thrown when the access level of a field in a class library is changed, and one or more assemblies referencing the library have not been recompiled.

example.para: The following example demonstrates a scenario under which is thrown.
The following code contains a class with a public field (myField). This class is compiled into a class library.
The following code references the class library above, and accesses TestNameSpace.Class1.myField. This code is compiled into an application.
The output of the application is
The code for the class library is changed and recompiled so that TestNameSpace.Class1.myField is no longer public. The following code changes myField from public to private.
When the application is executed again without being recompiled, the output is

summary.para:
Constructs and initializes a new instance of the
class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a private or protected field inside a type." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

MemberSignature.Value: public rtspecialname specialname instance void .ctor(string message)

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
An instance of that is the cause of the current exception. If is not a reference, the current exception was raised in a catch block handling .

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using and the property using . If is , the property is initialized to the system-supplied message provided by the constructor that takes no arguments.
